title: Isaac del Toro Just Signed Cycling’s Longest Contract through 2029
content:
SD Worx-Protime secures future through 2028 as 'mega contracts' continue to capture WorldTour's top talent: 'We are committed to our project.'

Read the full article at Isaac del Toro Just Signed Cycling’s Longest Contract through 2029 on Velo.
author: ahood
